A

address(String) - Static method in class Validate
Checks if a string containing an address meets minimum length requirements.
answerNumber(int, int) - Static method in class Validate
Validates user input when program is expecting an integer.

B

boxWidth - Static variable in class Contact
Sets the width for the box the contacts are displayed in.

C

Contact - Class in Unnamed Package
 
Contact() - Constructor for class Contact
Forces every new contact to have a personal ID, first name, last name and phone number.
Contact(String, String, String, String, String, String) - Constructor for class Contact
Creates a contact and sets attribute values from pre-existing information.
contactList - Static variable in class Contact
An ArrayList that contains every Contact object.
ContactsApp - Class in Unnamed Package
 
ContactsApp() - Constructor for class ContactsApp
 
contactsExist - Static variable in class Contact
 
createContact() - Static method in class ContactsApp
Creates a new contact, adds it to the contactList and writes its information to a file.

D

data() - Method in class Contact
Adds all the attributes of a contact into a single string.
dataFileName - Static variable in class ContactsApp
 
deleteContact() - Static method in class ContactsApp
Deletes contacts either by using the Contact.find method to delete a specific contact or by deleting all contacts.
displayFileName - Static variable in class ContactsApp
 

E

email(String) - Static method in class Validate
Checks if a string matches the pattern for an email address.

F

find() - Static method in class Contact
Iterates through the contactList (an ArrayList) to find the specific index where the contacts personal ID attribute is equal to the input.
formatInfo(String) - Method in class Contact
Formats text to fit into a box with a set width.

G

getAddress() - Method in class Contact
Returns the address of the contact.
getEmail() - Method in class Contact
Returns the email address of the contact.
getFirstName() - Method in class Contact
Returns the first name of the contact.
getLastName() - Method in class Contact
Returns the last name of the contact.
getPersonalID() - Method in class Contact
Returns the personal ID of the contact.
getPhoneNum() - Method in class Contact
Returns the phone number of the contact.

I

info() - Method in class Contact
Adds all the attributes of a contact in a box format into a single string.

K

knownEmails - Static variable in class Validate
An ArrayList containing all used email addresses
knownIDs - Static variable in class Validate
An ArrayList containing all used personal IDs
knownPhoneNums - Static variable in class Validate
An ArrayList containing all used phone numbers

L

loadFile() - Static method in class Contact
Reads the data file that contains every contact and adds them to a single string per contact that is then split into attributes and created into a contact by the toContact method.

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class ContactsApp
The main method that runs the program.
menu() - Static method in class ContactsApp
Lets the user navigate through ContactsApp

N

name(String) - Static method in class Validate
Checks if a string matches the pattern for a name.
noContacts() - Static method in class ContactsApp
Prints "You have no contacts." and adds a two second delay for clarity.

P

personalID(String) - Static method in class Validate
Checks if a string matches the pattern for a Finnish personal ID and if the personal ID has already been entered for another contact.
phoneNum(String) - Static method in class Validate
Checks if a string matches the pattern for a phone number and if the phone number has already been entered for another contact.

R

read() - Static method in class Contact
Reads text from a file using BufferedReader and FileReader, then prints it to the console one line at a time.
reWriteList() - Static method in class Contact
Writes the contents of contactList to a file file using BufferedWriter and FileWriter overwriting previous contents of the file.

S

setAddress() - Method in class Contact
Takes input from console and checks if it matches the pattern of an address.
setEmail() - Method in class Contact
Takes input from console and checks if it matches the pattern of an e-mail address.
setFirstName() - Method in class Contact
Takes input from console and checks if it matches the pattern of a name.
setLastName() - Method in class Contact
Takes input from console and checks if it matches the pattern of a name.
setPersonalID() - Method in class Contact
Takes input from console and checks if it matches the pattern of a personal ID.
setPhoneNum() - Method in class Contact
Takes input from console and checks if it matches the pattern of a phone number.

T

toContact(String) - Static method in class Contact
Splits a string into parts and assigns them as attributes to a contact.

U

updateContact() - Static method in class ContactsApp
Updates a single attribute of a specific contact using the Contact.find method then overwrites the text files with the new information.

V

Validate - Class in Unnamed Package
 
Validate() - Constructor for class Validate
 
viewContact() - Static method in class ContactsApp
Prints the information of every contact to the console.

W

write(Contact) - Static method in class Contact
Writes text to a file using BufferedWriter and FileWriter.
